See you this summer

For iOS For Android

Eugo is the first local bike sharing startup founded in Stockholm, Sweden. We want to bring you the convenience and enjoyment at any time.
Let's go cheap, go healthy and go green.

How to Eugo

  • Simple sign up.
  • Find vehicles nearby, scan QR code to unlock.
  • Tap to switch between bikes and scooters.

Stay safe & ride cool

Always helmet
Obey traffic rules
Ride on bicycle lane

Park and lock respectfully
